example.text: Mandating electrification while making it harder to produce electricity is a recipe for disaster. [[url]]

Congress passed a Republican-led, bipartisan resolution to protect American workers by overturning a rule that allowed Chinese solar panels to be dumped on the US market, stifling competition, and making us more dependent on China in the process. This resolution passed the… [[url]] [[url]]

HR 2, the Secure the Border Act, PASSED the House. With well over 5 million illegal border crossings since Joe Biden took office, it’s clear our nation is facing an invasion. It’s past time for us to build the wall, secure the border, and enforce our laws to end the crisis… [[url]] [[url]]
